data_subject.name: Anonymous User
data_subject.description: An individual that is unidentifiable to the systems. Note - This should only be applied to truly anonymous users where there is no risk of re-identification

data_subject.name: Citizen Voter
data_subject.description: An individual registered to voter with a state or authority.

data_subject.name: Commuter
data_subject.description: An individual that is traveling or transiting in the context of location tracking.

data_subject.name: Consultant
data_subject.description: An individual employed in a consultative/temporary capacity by the organization.

data_subject.name: Custom
data_subject.description: An individual or other organization that purchases goods or services from the organization.

data_subject.name: Employee
data_subject.description: An individual employed by the organization.

data_subject.name: Job Applicant
data_subject.description: An individual applying for employment to the organization.

data_subject.name: Next of Kin
data_subject.description: A relative of any other individual subject where such a relationship is known.

data_subject.name: Passenger
data_subject.description: An individual traveling on some means of provided transport.

data_subject.name: Patient
data_subject.description: An individual identified for the purposes of any medical care.

data_subject.name: Prospect
data_subject.description: An individual or organization to whom an organization is selling goods or services.

data_subject.name: Shareholder
data_subject.description: An individual or organization that holds equity in the organization.

data_subject.name: Supplier/Vendor
data_subject.description: An individual or organization that provides services or goods to the organization.

data_subject.name: Trainee
data_subject.description: An individual undergoing training by the organization.
